data.title: Trains to the Manchester Museum
data.meta_description: Check out the nearest station to the Manchester Museum and book your train tickets with Trainline. Save an average of 61% on trains to the Manchester Museum.
data.text:
Travelling by train to the Manchester Museum is super-simple. The nearest railway station to the Manchester Museum is Manchester Oxford Road, which is served by Northern, Transport for Wales, East Midlands Railway, and TransPennine Express services throughout the day. It's 14 minutes to the Manchester Museum on foot. Turn right out of the station and head down Oxford Road. The museum will be on your right-hand side.

The Manchester Museum is full of wonders for all to enjoy. You'll find it jam-packed with a fascinating historic collection and intriguing displays, suitable for all ages.
